ARABIC: ثُمَّ بَعَثْنَٰكُم مِّنۢ بَعْدِ مَوْتِكُمْ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَشْكُرُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Then We brought you back to life after your death, so that perhaps you would show thanks.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Even then We revived you after you had become senseless that you might give thanks;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Then We raised you to life so that you might become grateful for this favour.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Then We brought you back to life in the hope that you might appreciate Our favors.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Then We brought you back to life after your death, so that you may be grateful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then We raised you up after your death, so that you might be grateful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then We raised you up after your death that you may give thanks.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Then We raised you up after you were dead, that haply you should be thankful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then We revived you after your extinction, that ye might give thanks.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Then We brought you back to life after your death, so that you might be grateful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then We raised you after your death that haply ye may return thanks.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Then We raised you up after your death so that you might give thanks.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Then We raised you up after your death: Ye had the chance to be grateful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then We raised you up after your death, so that you might be grateful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Then We raised you from your death, so that you might give thanks.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Then We revived you after your death, so that you may be appreciative.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then We revived you after your death that perhaps you would be grateful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [2:56] Then We raised you up, brought you back to life, after you were dead, so that you might be thankful, for this favour of Ours.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Then We revived you) We brought you back to life (after your death) after burning you, (that ye might give thanks) that you might give thanks that I brought you back to life.
